attributes.action: Expose the killing by starvation of 25,000 people every day, [more in a week than by the Iraq war, 4 times more per day than by of the Holocaust,  as many as on an average day of World War 2,] through the destruction of underdeveloped nations economies by selling at subsidised half price against them the food which is the only thing most of them can produce
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This rising toll makes today the most tragic day in human history, yields the moral high ground to Al Quaida and only benefits us by adding 2% to our standard of living.  I will send any doubter 100 pages of proof, as I am a qualified economist with UCLA and Stanford training
